mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.travelreimbursement(uid, releaseUid, destination, expenses, reason, nextUid) values (#{uid}, #{releaseUid}, #{destination}, #{expenses}, #{reason}, #{nextUid})
mapper.select:
select uid, releaseUid, destination, expenses, reason, status, nextUid, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.travelreimbursement where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0
and destination like concat('%', #{destination}, '%')
and expenses like concat('%', #{expenses}, '%')
and reason like concat('%', #{reason}, '%')
order by create_time desc
select uid, releaseUid, destination, expenses, reason, status, nextUid, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.travelreimbursement where uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update oa_sys.travelreimbursement set destination=#{destination}, expenses=#{expenses}, reason=#{reason}, nextUid=#{nextUid}, status=#{status} where uid = #{uid}
